title: Best Tech Gifts 2021: Our Favorite Gadgets
sub_head: Yes, we’ll tell you the best phones and tablets to buy. But we can also recommend home-fitness systems, wrist cameras, follow-me robots and more, all tested by WSJ’s Personal Tech team
body: The global chip shortage posed a unique challenge for our annual list of the most gift-worthy tech products—especially when it came to offbeat items. We still managed to find, in addition to our usual smartphone, speaker and gear recommendations, a useful UV-enabled, app-connected water pitcher and a sassy talking animatronic cat. We included a few splurges, too, like a colorful auto-following cargo robot that—for $1,850—will make you the talk of your Trader Joe’s.
